synopsis.text:
Tsukisuzu Nachi, the eldest member of the band Irodorimidori, is set to graduate high school after an eventful musical journey. To commemorate this milestone, the band reunites for one final live performance together. However, this isn't the end of their musical adventureâ€”it's only the beginning!

Introducing the official music video for the song "Change Our Mirai!: Our 7 Lights" by the fictional band Irodorimidori, a creation of Sega's Chunithm rhythm arcade game. As the 34th song in the Irodorimidori series, the music video is a delightful mix of chibi animation, motion comic clips, and a brand-new full animated piece that will leave you wanting more.

Experience the magic of Irodorimidori's music and animation in this must-see music video, marking a significant milestone in the band's journey. Don't miss out on the chance to witness their talent and creativity!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
